entry.title: From Stage Lights to Sirens
entry.summary:
Author: sherlockedblogger20

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,027Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 60

Summary: â€œSo, you never thought to mention that you were a star performer?â€ Eddie asked, keeping his voice light, but Buck could hear the edge beneath it.â€œI didnâ€™t think it was relevant.â€Eddie scoffed. â€œYeah, because itâ€™s not at all surprising that youâ€™re secretly a show choir legend.â€Buck shrugged. â€œLike I saidâ€”long time ago.â€Eddie didnâ€™t respond immediately, but Buck could feel him watching. When he finally spoke, his tone was quieter. â€œThey knew you really well.â€â€œThey were my family,â€ Buck admitted. â€œBefore everything else.â€Eddie nodded but said nothing more. He didnâ€™t need to. The pang of jealousy had already settled in. Buck had a past that Eddie hadnâ€™t known, a past that had once made him happy. And for some reason, that bothered him more than he was willing to admit.As they climbed into the truck, Buck stole one last glance at his old friends. And Eddie? He stole one last glance at Quinn, feeling the weight of something he didnâ€™t quite understand. But what he did know was that Buck had never looked at anyone the way he had looked at her just now.

entry.title: All Too Well
entry.summary:
Author: sherlockedblogger20

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,284Chapters: 7/12Kudos: 126

Summary: Despite his attempts, Chimney's speech although rousing, failed. Buck transferred out of the 118. Eddie returned to El Paso with Chris.It's been six years, and Eddie is back in L.A. Chris is gone, college bound and Eddie finds himself back in a place he had long forgotten to call home. Time had drifted them, meet ups became video calls, video calls became texts, then texts turned into a couple of birthday and Christmas wishes between most of them.Buck and Eddie's friendship stilted after Bobby's death and Eddie's return to El Paso. Two different lives. Neither are sure what or who was to blame. Eddie still can't help but feel regret though, especially now he's been out and somewhat proud the past few years. But what happens when he catches up to Buck and sees where his own life took him?

entry.title: Gardens Are a Cut Throat Business [so is love]
entry.summary:
Author: sassay

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,212Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Eddie stares at the massive display in front of him in horror. How are there so many different kinds of fertiliser? And of course Pepa isn't answering his calls to ask which one she wants for her roses. Eddie closes his eyes and pinches the bridge of his nose. Evan didn't become a firefighter, instead he studied horticulture and botanicals, starting his own business in sustainable, green landscaping. He meets Eddie having a crisis in the fertiliser section of the local nursery and things grow..Buck loves his new house, his landscaping skills come in handy as he completely reworks his bare yard. His neighbours seem nice too - Chris is inquisitive and clever and his step-mum, Carla is friendly as well. An alternative universe meet-cute and slow burn romance along with missed moments, arguments, misunderstandings and a series of events where no one realises that Evan and Buck are the same person also known as the Gardener Buck AU.

entry.title: Happier Than Ever
entry.summary:
Author: stonyismyotp

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,804Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 402

Summary: "Itâ€™s Dr. Wells. The Dr. Wells Bobby had sent Buck to, over a year and a half ago. The same one he couldnâ€™t quite admit had taken advantage of him, had made him feel numb whenever he tried sharing his feelings, who made it impossible to open up to any other therapistâ€” She was there and she had a baby. A baby who couldnâ€™t be more than ten months old. A baby with his blonde hair and bright blue eyes, not her dark hair and dark eyes." or Dr. Wells had a baby & never told Buck. - title from the song by billie eilish pls heed the tags, & i'll be putting warnings at the beginning of each chapter, this is going to be a relatively heavy fic (tho it will be focused on recovery) so pls prioritize your own mental health.
